main-poster.text: An authentic vacation in the midst of Ukrainian color!

swiper.text: Polonyny Carpathians, in the village of Oriv in the middle of the mountains there is a cozy corner for unforgettable experiences. Real Ukrainian mountains, homemade cheese-making on polony, waterfalls and ancient trees are waiting for you.

second-poster.text: Active recreation in unusual locations. Pristine nature and local flavor will give you unforgettable impressions.

about-us.title: About Us
about-us.poster-sub-title: Rest, emotions, impressions, atypical routes, incredible locations - this is all about rural eco-tourism in Ukraine.

text.first-paragraph: Our team has collected the most colorful places in our country for you.
text.second-paragraph: The mission of our company is to provide an unforgettable experience and show Ukraine from a different side. Walk with you along the forest paths to eat fresh Carpathian cheese. Dive into the canyon and see the village of Bakota submerged under the thickness of the years. Ride gondolas in the “Ukrainian Venice”.

notiflix.title: Thank you
notiflix.message: Our representative will contact you shortly at your number
